text: Oo haddaad ka cabsataan inaydaan ula dhaqmi karin si caddaalad ah (gabdhaha) agoomaha ah, markaa guursada haween- kaa (kale) wixii idinla habboonaada, labo iyo saddex iyo afarba haddiise aad ka cabsataan inaydaan ula dhaqmi doonin si caddaalad ah2 markaa (ku ekaada guursiga) mid keliya3 ama waxay gacmahiinnu midig hantaan4. Tan baa u dhow, inaydaan gardarro falin
